description:
Asia's first ever Peruvian cevicheria, TONO
is a full-service restaurant serving legit Peruvian ceviche and some of the
best authentic Peruvian cuisine, using only the most authentic, freshest
harvest and  Be sure to try the mouth-watering national dish of
Peru, the ceviche, and pair it with Pisco Sour – the definitive drink of the cevicheria!  With Salsa music playing in the
background, we are ready for the party of our lives! (If you did not know, TONO

event!

The brand’s cheeky, hip and playful attitude permeates from its interiors which includes an attention-grabbing floor mural designed by tattoo artist Christ Garver of Miami Ink fame, to its personable and enthusiastic service and culinary  With the gorgeous waterfront view, it makes for a good place for business meetings amongst expatriates and office executives working  As Singapore’s first graffiti art bar, Kinki Rooftop Bar is the epitome of a Tokyo underground  Set within an urban landscape with a spectacular view of the Marina Bay waterfront, the bar is filled with edgy graffiti and warm lights to set a hip yet relaxing and unpretentious vibe for friends to hang  Kinki Restaurant + Bar is a great event venue for hosting parties, team-bonding get-together, office parties and even happy hour with friends!

title: Mr Punch Public House
description:
Best known for his work in the puppet show, ‘Punch & Judy’, Mr Punch now introduces his latest venture at 26 Seah Street: Mr Punch Public House. Iconic for its walls, which are adorned with vintage enamel and tin signs, the space exudes just the kind of odd familiarity that makes it feel like home to a travelling old- Cozy and intimate, the basement is perfect for casual events and private get-together, while the wild and free can find their home at the  

True to his puppet shows origin, Mr Punch adds showmanship to each event, from his Opening Act table to his Finale  Mr Punch Public House provide the inspiration and the venue that will make your event be it a birthday party or a company get-together a truly memorable and unique one!

title: Napoleon Food & Wine Bar
description:
Whether you are a wine connoisseur or just the occasional wine lover, at Napoleon you will be able to enjoy wines at your pace and comfort, in a cozy  Its innovative concept, revolving around pairing and sharing, offers the chance to taste 32 European wines by the glass and pair them with the Singaporean chef's interpretation of Southern European casual 

Discover our food and wine matching suggestions specially created around defined categories of  Napoleon Food & Wine Bar has a dedicated team who will assist you in creating a phenomenal event, regardless whether it is a simple birthday party or a lavish corporate function, it will surely be a memorable one!

title: No.5 Emerald Hill Cocktail Bar
description:
Affectionately known as No.5, this bar has become the favorite “watering hole” for many locals, expatriates and tourists since  Housed in a 1910 Peranakan shophouse, the old charm and flavor of the Peranakan are retained with the original wall paint, antique carvings and unpolished wooden floorboards still  Just minutes away from the busy hub of Orchard Road, the quaintness of Emerald Hill and the charisma of the architecture provide a warm and cozy ambiance at No. 

Customers will feel immediately at home when they step into the  Serving an impressive range of international cocktails, mocktails, shooters, long drinks, beers and spirits using premium labels as house pours! This unique shophouse bar is great for knocking down a few beers with friends and family or have a lavish birthday party with some tasty alcoholic cocktails!

At night, Origin Sin is known to have a candlelight ambiance indoors and  With a nice garden table at the outdoor seating area, diners can have a gorgeous view of the night  Should the need arises, Origin sin is able to display an outdoor bar and a DJ Console. The restaurant can be booked separately by indoor or outdoor or both spaces together for the event organizer's  The versatile nature that the restaurant provides make this the perfect venue for hosting parties, anniversaries, corporate functions, business luncheons, business dinners and many other events!

title: Rang Mahal
description:
Centrally located in the heart of Singapore’s city centre, Rang Mahal is a fine-dining destination that serves up the best of Indian cuisine with modern  Taking pride in quality, excellence and focused on cooking from the heart, a meal at the acclaimed restaurant entails more than the assembly of freshest ingredients and culinary finesse; Rang Mahal represents fine dining that is unpretentious and exemplary, bringing people together through familiar yet refreshing flavours that delight the palate and nourish the body and 

Since its establishment in 1971, Rang Mahal has been recognised as one of Singapore’s leading Indian fine-dining restaurants with accolades such as the Singapore Brand Prestige Award – Heritage Brands Award, Wine Spectator’s Award of Excellence from 2016 to 2018 and the Michelin Plate in 2018 and  Whether you are looking to host an intimate birthday party or a lavish corporate function, Rang Mahal will be sure to make your event an unforgettable

title: Sen of Japan

Outfitted with blond wood bar counters and floor-to-ceiling windows, the unrivaled views are coupled with fresh and expertly prepared  Sen of Japan provides a undeniably exotic experience for their  With great scenic views of the Singapore Skyline and the Promenade, your event, be it a Christmas party, corporate party, year end party or just a small and intimate birthday party is set to be a memorable one at Sen of Japan.

This luxurious yacht will be the perfect getaway party venue from anniversaries to corporate party, SG Yacht is sure to make this an occasion to remember!

description:
Asia's first ever Peruvian cevicheria, TONO
is a full-service restaurant serving legit Peruvian ceviche and some of the
best authentic Peruvian cuisine, using only the most authentic, freshest
harvest and  Be sure to try the mouth-watering national dish of
Peru, the ceviche, and pair it with Pisco Sour – the definitive drink of the cevicheria!  With Salsa music playing in the
background, we are ready for the party of our lives! (If you did not know, TONO
means Party in Peruvian slang!) The colorful and welcoming interior is a good
space for hosting cosy luncheons of up to 30 guests seated or even standing
cocktail events for up to 40  Not to forget the alfresco area, which can
accommodate up to another 100 guests – an ideal spot for your next Taco Tuesday
event! 




Awarded: Tatler Dining SG Best Restaurants
2019/2020, TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence 2019 Winner

description:
TONITO serves Latin American cuisine from
places like Mexico, Peru, Cuba and Argentina in an easy-going oasis for
everyone, anytime of the week, and aims to showcase the different flavours of
Latin America in a family-friendly  Be exposed to the different
cuisines and be wowed by a wide selection of Mexican “Tacos and Quesadillas”,
Peruvian “Anticuchos”, Latin American sandwiches like Argentinian “Choripanes”
and Venezuelan ” Pepitos”.  




With a small but cosy setting, TONITO is
able to house up to 70 pax seated – perfect for luncheons or even private
celebrations as guests savour Latino favorites like Tacos, Quesadillas, and a
range of delectable sandwiches, with the world’s tallest indoor waterfall

description:
TONITO serves Latin American cuisine from
places like Mexico, Peru, Cuba and Argentina in an easy-going oasis for
everyone, anytime of the week, and aims to showcase the different flavours of
Latin America in a family-friendly  Be exposed to the different
cuisines and be wowed by a wide selection of Mexican “Tacos and Quesadillas”,
Peruvian “Anticuchos”, Latin American sandwiches like Argentinian “Choripanes”
and Venezuelan ” Pepitos”.  




With a small but cosy setting, TONITO is
able to house up to 70 pax seated – perfect for luncheons or even private
celebrations as guests savour Latino favorites like Tacos, Quesadillas, and a
range of delectable sandwiches, with the world’s tallest indoor waterfall
vortex as the  You might even want to switch things up and transform
the space for cocktail and networking sessions, with a total standing capacity
of up to 100 pax; the terrace is well-poised for such events!

description: RGB Space is a sprawling multi-functional event space located in the heart of Jalan Besar that is easily accessible by car and MRT. This 1700 sqft dimension is designed with one goal in mind - to give you and your guests an unforgettable  This eclectic space is filled with old school arcade games, basketball machines, darts corner, card and board games, cool feature walls, karaoke room, open mic stage and more! There are also lots of instagrammable spots for you to snap at! Whether you're organizing glam parties, birthday celebrations, baby showers, small or large scale office parties, team-bonding sessions, seminars, corporate workshops and gatherings, RGB Space is ready for BOOK NOW to secure your slots or press the Call Host button to chat with us directly if you have any questions!

title: NJ Relish

price.price: $2500/3hours - For Entire venue
S$600/3 hours
S$350/3 hours
Room booking for 3 hours minimum spending should be SGD250++

description:
NJ Relish, ethos “bring into being” stems from our passion to create something unique and personalised for every  From International breakfast Buffet to European & American fusion Semi-Buffet lunch, our chefs pamper your palate, spoil you for choices and offer a personalised approach towards your dining 

NJ unique concept of “No Menu” option stems from this  We bring our patrons a step closer to the ‘close knit family’ where the food is cooked according to each one’s likes and  Just share your favourites foods or not-so favourite foods, and the Chef caters personally to the palate of each guest to relish and 

NJ team is passionate about creating the dining experience, where you can rejuvenate, make connections, entertain guests or have business meetings in a quiet, classy 

INTERNATIONAL BREAKFAST BUFFET:
NJ Relish offers a sumptuous buffet for breakfast with a lavish spread of American, Continental and Asian breakfast  Typical egg station, pancake station, cereal, pastries, cold cuts and sausages are 

LUNCH - SEMI BUFFET -EUROPEAN & AMERICAN FUSION:
Our Semi-Buffet option is for the busy professionals who are looking for a healthy, quick and innovative lunch options in a formal  Our creative Semi-Buffet fuses local ingredients and flavours to create an interesting international fusion  The spread offers rich variety of food options in the form of Salad, Breads, Mains, Desserts & Detox  
THE SALAD BAR:
Create your salad bowls with our wide variety of greens, proteins, cold cuts, meats, cheese, breads, salad, condiments & 

MAINS:
Our chef gets creative with main-course dishes and keeps changing the menu on a rotational basis to offer fresh Beef, Pasta, Chicken or Duck, Pork Sausages, Fish N Chips, Risotto & Mutton Biryani. 
Desserts: Indulge your sweet tooth with tempting array of sumptuous  From fruit to fondue, crisp waffles with ice-cream, butter pudding and a wide selection of cakes, our colourful dessert station spoils you for  

EVENTS:
Our specialised menus are designed to create a special culinary  Special menus on request options are available in all our  Our Chefs will be delighted to customise the menu as per your event 

We can provide AV Equipment (includes: Projector, screen, wireless microphone, speaker) at a rental charge of $150++

We believe in NO venue charges, for our venue so our guest will enjoy more benefits when they book with us by only paying for food and  We will allocate a private area to host your event which will not be accessible to the general  Private rooms are also available at NJ Relish to host your business meetings and 

We would like to introduce our three outlets in Singapore


Cali @ Park Avenue Rochester, Bouna Vista

Cali @ Changi Park Avenue, Changi Business Park 

NJ Relish @ Ascott Raffles Place (CBD Area)
 

Do let us know your preferred location and requirements and we will do our best to accommodate your special needs to make the events most memorable events, let us know if you have any further 

We look forward to hosting you at our venue for ‘Creating Moment’ at Cali or ‘Bring into Being” at NJ Relish for your

title: Grissini
description:
Grissini is a contemporary restaurant that is located in Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel facing the river with a stunning view of Singapore  This space presents a unique interior, furnished with sleek yet modern furnitures and elegant art  Also, Grissini layout provides guests the flexibility of choosing the layout with an option of removable chairs and cocktail  

This unique, modern, elegant and classy event venue is definitely suitable for formal events ranging from product launches, meetings, workshops, to company dinners, parties

Occupying the almost 200-year-old building that was Singapore's first Parliament House, The Arts House has been offering its audiences a broad range of arts and culture  It also plays an active role in the Singapore creative  Once a space where Singapore’s most important decisions were made, the former Parliamentary Chamber is the highlight of The Arts House, and is now a popular venue for musical performances, stage productions and  

Other venue options include a black box theatre, galleries, multi-purpose rooms, and a screening room, featuring a digital cinema projector and 1 Dolby surround  The different rooms available at the Art House makes it easier for hosts to pick a perfect venue regardless if it is a birthday party or a fashion show, The Art House is able to cater to those

description: Located in Marina One, The Spot Singapore is a multi-concept semi-fine dining restaurant that incorporates South East Asian sauces using a contemporary European style of  The food embodies the training Executive Chef, Lee Boon Seng went through in Michelin-starred The interiors encapsulate a funky yet modern aesthetic, showing off a flexible seating capacity of 190 pax and standing of 300  The Spot Singapore also has a Private Dining Room that can sit up to 20  The various spaces within the The Spot are functionally interwoven so that diners can engage in different activities on its own or in combination such as Wine and Whisky tastings, Course meals, Canapes, Alfresco bar snacks

title: WAKANUI Grill Dining Singapore
description:
WAKANUI Grill Dining Singapore is known for its premium-quality dry-aged Ocean Beef and succulent WAKANUI Spring Lamb from New Zealand, grilled on Binchotan  

The restaurant made its name in Tokyo, Japan and the WAKANUI franchise in Singapore is the only overseas outlet operated by 1855 F&B Pte. Ltd. 

With a total seating capacity of 86 pax and standing capacity of 120 pax, WAKANUI overlooks the lush central gardens and towering office buildings of Marina One, offering a welcoming respite from the bustle of city  WAKANUI also has three private dining rooms, each sitting up to 8  Two of which can be combined to form one large private dining  Perfect for a business meeting!

Awards

One Star by Singapore's Top Restaurants (2018/2019) awarded by Wine & Dine Magazine 

Singapore's Top Restaurants (2018/2019) awarded by Singapore Tatler Magazine

description:
Jewel Changi Airport,
Singapore's latest lifestyle destination and iconic architectural landmark, is
home to a range of unique event and meeting spaces that offer some of
Singapore’s most stunning  Set
against the backdrop of spectacular landscaping and with a majestic view of the
HSBC Rain Vortex, this destination offers one-of-a-kind venues that provide
memorable experiences for different  larger scale corporate gala dinners and conferences, lifestyle brand launches, networking
cocktail sessions and Family Day events … to cosy festive and birthday
celebrations, corporate team-building activities, workplan retreats and board meetings,
there is a wide variety of spaces to cater to all your event and meeting needs!
roomName: Changi Experience Studio Private Rooms (Seminars and Board Meetings)

description: Formerly located at Fort Canning Park on the site originally for the Singapore Council for Adult Education, Drama Centre was the key platform for local companies starting out in the early 1980s, staging Singapore plays like Lao Jiu, Army Daze and Mail Order Brides.The location of Drama Centre in the National Library building creates an unprecedented synergy with the arts facilities, attractions, institutions and the commercial sector to enliven the surrounding Drama Centre adds to Singapore’s performing arts spaces with its 615-seat proscenium  It also offers an intimate 120-seater black box, VIP lounge and function rooms to meet the diverse demands of today’s arts events – from mid-sized theatrical presentations, to intimate performances, talks and Drama Centre, a National Arts Council arts venue, is managed by Arts House Ltd.

title: The JTC Summit

price.price: 50% of above rates for rehearsal/set-up/dismantlement

description:
The JTC Summit is the ideal real estate solution for firms in the engineering and technology-related industries, particularly those looking to set up their corporate headquarters in Singapore. The 31-storey development is strategically located in the upcoming Jurong Lake District, with easy access to the industrial clusters in Jurong and Tuas, public transportation and major  Tenants can enjoy a vast and diverse selection of banking, food, retail and recreational amenities Notes
The rate for usage of audio-video equipment and the hiring of a technician in the Theatrette will be an additional $30 per hour (minimum booking of 4 hours, and an advance notice of at least 3 working days required even for express bookings).
Usage of facilities after business hours is subjected to 5 times of  the above rental rates/booking 
JTC Summit facilities are only available for booking from 9am-5pm on weekdays (except public holidays).

description:
Get away from the stuffy meeting room, and bring your events and meetings to new heights at Faber Peak Singapore, where the vibrant venues are a breath of fresh air and the views are invigorating! The only top-of-hill event location in Singapore with a bird's eye view of the harbour, Sentosa and the city  With 2 event venues-with-a-view & 2 restaurants, Faber Peak Singapore is a perfect venue for company events, weddings and celebrations!

Situated in Mount Faber Park and great views, Faber Peak is only 15 minutes from the city by  Choose from the optional transport service or arrive by Singapore Cable Car.

description:
The world’s top young university, NTU is named
one of the most beautiful schools in the   NTU has two choice
locations opened for meetings, executive trainings, seminars, workshops, conferences, celebrations and special events

NTU at one-north is close to the heart of
Singapore, 10 minutes' drive
to Singapore’s CBD and well served by the one-north and Buona Vista MRT
Stations. Nanyang Executive
Centre (NEC) sits on main campus in west Singapore, just a short drive away
from major retail malls located at Jurong East and Singapore’s new national
garden, Jurong Lake Gardens. The campus is a bus ride away from Boon Lay and
Pioneer MRT  Car parking is available at both 
The event venues are well furnished with
amenities such as projector, screen, tables, chairs, sound system etc From
Seminar Rooms, Function Rooms and Lecture Theatres to Auditorium, both venues
offers flexible meeting and event spaces to
suit any meeting, event or celebration. Our in-house F&B provides a
selection of menus from bentos, cocktail reception, seminar catering, buffet
catering to vegetarian and healthier choice  For residential events, NEC
offers comfortable 170 hotel-like guest  Daily rates include
complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and access to the Sports & Recreation
facilities such as gym, pool and running 
 For enquiries, please contact
our Sales & Marketing Team for a proposal

description:
The world’s top young university, NTU is named
one of the most beautiful schools in the   NTU has two choice
locations opened for meetings, executive trainings, seminars, workshops, conferences, celebrations and special events

NTU at one-north is close to the heart of
Singapore, 10 minutes' drive
to Singapore’s CBD and well served by the one-north and Buona Vista MRT
Stations. Nanyang Executive
Centre (NEC) sits on main campus in west Singapore, just a short drive away
from major retail malls located at Jurong East and Singapore’s new national
garden, Jurong Lake Gardens. The campus is a bus ride away from Boon Lay and
Pioneer MRT  Car parking is available at both

amenities such as projector, screen, tables, chairs, sound system etc From

catering to vegetarian and healthier choice  For residential events, NEC
offers comfortable 170 hotel-like guest  Daily rates include
complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and access to the Sports & Recreation
facilities such as gym, pool and running

our Sales & Marketing Team for a proposal

description:
With elements of Asian cuisine complementing our specialities, Yassin Kampung Seafood strives to capture the essence of our authentic Singaporean cuisine through our succulent delights, serving as a call back the origins of Singaporean 
A restaurant immersed in the rich history of Singapore’s past, Yassin Kampung Seafood takes you back to simpler times with its nostalgic flair, utilizing elements in its decor traditionally found in the early kampung days of Singapore as it instils a cosy and familiar feeling for families to dine 

With our rustic atap roofs and vintage wooden theme, our restaurant prides on capturing the “gotong royong” and “kampong spirit” of earlier generations as our staff works faithfully and selflessly to bring you only the best we can 

First established in 2002, Yassin Kampung Seafood has served as a popular destination for locals in the northern region of Singapore as well as travellers passing through the Causeway for it is a family-oriented environment and affordable  Suitable events: corporate events, weddings, birthday parties, anniversaries & family events
roomName: Dinner Private Event Package - Function Hall

description: First established in 1862, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is one of the most recognizable landmarks in Singapore. The heritage building located in the heart of the city’s Civic District contains a 614-seat Theatre and a 673-seat Concert Hall.In 2010, the national monument underwent a four-year refurbishment to restore its neo-classical façade while getting new state-of-the-art facilities and  The redevelopment also saw the addition of two smaller rooms for music, dance and theatre Having played a role in the country’s history for over 150 years, the Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall continues to be an exciting mid-sized platform, supporting the growth of Singapore’s arts Victoria Theatre & Victoria Concert Hall is managed by Arts House Ltd.

description: Biopolis at one-north is one of JTC's key projects to boost the biomedical industry as Singapore's next engine of economic  As the premier research hub for Biomedical Sciences, it hosts leading public and private biomedical research institutes and organisations, and anchors the development of the entire research and development (R&D) value chain of life  This encompasses basic drug discovery, clinical development and medical technology  ​The Biopolis comprises 5 phases, with JTC undertaking the development of Phase 1 in  Subsequent phases were developed by private developers and companies such as Ascendas and Procter & Gamble.

title: Jurong Town Hall
description:
Strategically located in the heart of Jurong with excellent connectivity to other parts of Singapore, as well as a wide range of amenities nearby, Jurong Town hall served as JTC’s first permanent headquarters from 1974 to 2000 and is a key landmark that symbolizes Singapore’s successful industrialization programme during the nation-building  Gazetted as a national monument in 2015, Jurong Town Hall now houses the Trade Association Hub, which supports a vibrant ecosystem of trade associations and chambers and plays a critical role in the next phase of Singapore's economic 

With so many different room options, hosts have the freedom to choose a room that can specifically meet the needs of their  Hosts can host events such as meetings, corporate seminars, corporate functions, corporate hackathon, product launches and product exhibitions here at Jurong Town Hall.

title: Jurong Town Hall
description:
Strategically located in the heart of Jurong with excellent connectivity to other parts of Singapore, as well as a wide range of amenities nearby, Jurong Town hall served as JTC’s first permanent headquarters from 1974 to 2000 and is a key landmark that symbolizes Singapore’s successful industrialization programme during the nation-building  Gazetted as a national monument in 2015, Jurong Town Hall now houses the Trade Association Hub, which supports a vibrant ecosystem of trade associations and chambers and plays a critical role in the next phase of Singapore's economic 

With so many different room options, hosts have the freedom to choose a room that can specifically meet the needs of their  Hosts can host events such as meetings, corporate seminars, corporate functions, corporate hackathon, product launches and product exhibitions here at Jurong Town Hall.

price.price: Maximum 120 seats without tables & 56 seats with tables

description:
​JTC Aviation Two caters to the demand from aerospace companies seeking small to medium spaces from 100 sqm to 1,600 sqm within the Seletar Aerospace Park (SAP). The development offers industrial units equipped with heavy loading, high floor clearances and large floor plates, and office and amenity spaces for  Standing at 11-storey, JTC Aviation Two will be the tallest in the SAP, exemplifying JTC's commitment to land ​
Rental rates are for usage of the facilities during business hours (Mondays-Fridays: 8:30am to 5:30pm; Sat: 8:30am to 12:30pm).

Minimum booking of one (1) hour is required for all 

Any booking made before and/or end after the business hours are subjected to an additional 5 times the charges of the business hours 


All rooms come with multimedia
